member.name: F:bbt.gateway.common.Models.SendMessageSmsRequest.HeaderInfo
member.summary: Consumer can set sender direclty. If sender is set to Burgan(1) or On(2) by consumer do not load header informattion and user selected sender and related prefix/suffix.

member.name: P:bbt.gateway.common.Models.SendMessageSmsRequest.ContactId
member.summary: Consumer can set sender direclty. If sender is set to Burgan(1) or On(2) by consumer do not load header informattion and user selected sender and related prefix/suffix.

member.name: P:bbt.gateway.common.Models.v2.SmsRequest.Sender
member.summary: You have to submit sender source. There is two senders are available, **Burgan** end On. If you do not know sender of receiver, please set as AutoDetect.
member.remarks: System uses header configuration to set sender automatically.

member.name: P:bbt.gateway.common.Models.v2.SmsRequestString.Sender
member.summary: You have to submit sender source. There is two senders are available, **Burgan** end On. If you do not know sender of receiver, please set as AutoDetect.
member.remarks: System uses header configuration to set sender automatically.

member.name: M:bbt.gateway.common.CoreExtensions.UseConsulSettings(Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHostBuilder,System.Type)
member.summary:
Read Appsettings From Consule
ConsulHost and ConsulToken have to be set in appsettings

member.name: M:bbt.gateway.common.CoreExtensions.UseSeriLog(Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHostBuilder,System.String)
member.summary:
Set Serilog Configuration To Logging Elastic Search
ElasticSearch:ApiKey and ElasticSearch:Url have to be set in appsettings
